title: Business Simulation-Based Causal Relationship Learning Strategy

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental scientific principles and data analysis competencies
context.additional_context: Learners utilize simulation tools on individual devices and engage in activities to visually analyze causal relationships during team-based projects.

learning_goals: Learners can represent causal relationships between variables in a business simulation as causal maps with 80% or higher accuracy
Learners can develop a strategy to improve market share by 15% through three or more simulations
Learners can achieve an average return on investment improvement of 10% in two consecutive simulations without causal maps
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
